long_description: The Yakima LoadWarrior system isn't merely a basket, it's an ultra-capacity, multi-use beast! LoadWarrior merges versatility with a cavernous load-carrying capacity; ideal for loads tall in stature and wide in girth. Front and rear load bars allow direct attachment of Yakima accessory mounts to carry your bike, skis, or canoe. Quick-release hardware and custom fairing included. Weather-resistant, heavy-duty steel construction is incredibly durable yet lightweight. Increase load-holding capacity by 40% with the addition of 18" LoadWarrior Extension(TM), sold separately. Add the LoadWarrior StretchNet(TM) (sold separately) to firmly secure your gear. Universal hardware fits round bars, square bars and many factory racks.
short_description: The Yakima LoadWarrior system isn't merely a basket, it's an ultra-capacity, multi-use beast!
